1: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> לְדָוִ֗ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> שִֽׁיר׃ <sup>7892 </sup> <n>[or] Song</n> יָק֣וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>arise</n> אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>Let God</n> יָפ֣וּצוּ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>be scattered</n> אוֹיְבָ֑יו <sup>341 </sup> <n>let his enemies</n> וְיָנ֥וּסוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>him flee</n> מְ֝שַׂנְאָ֗יו <sup>8130 </sup> <n>let them also that hate</n> מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>

3: וְֽצַדִּיקִ֗ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>But let the righteous</n> יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>be glad</n> יַֽ֭עַלְצוּ <sup>5970 </sup> <n>let them rejoice</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> וְיָשִׂ֥ישׂוּ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>rejoice</n> בְשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <sup>8057 </sup> <n>yea let them exceedingly</n>
